name: Boneyard Showdown
description:
The ultimate necromancy duel starts now!
Use your magic and might to collect bones from everything that lives and build your army of skeletons to tear your opponent's castle down.

Boneyard Showdown is a competitive offline multiplayer action game originally made for the Weekly Game Jam #8 with the reborn theme.
